name: Air Fryer Honey Mustard Chicken Nugget Wraps with Sweet Potato Chips
description: Crispy air-fried chicken nuggets and sweet potato chips bundled into quick honey mustard wraps. Mild, kid-friendly, and ready in minutes.
prep_steps: Preheat air fryer to 200°C/390°F for 3 minutes.
Shred lettuce and grate cheddar cheese if needed.
Lay out 4 wraps and have honey mustard ready.
Microwave the wraps for 15–20 seconds just before assembly to soften.
cook_steps: Add sweet potato chips to one side of the air fryer basket and chicken nuggets to the other side in a single layer.
Air fry at 200°C/390°F for 10–12 minutes, shaking/turning halfway through, until nuggets are hot and crisp and chips are golden.
Season sweet potato chips with a pinch of salt and pepper if desired.
Fill each warm wrap with lettuce, tomato slices, a handful of cheddar cheese, and 4–5 chicken nuggets.
Drizzle honey mustard over the filling, roll up tightly, and slice in half.
Serve wraps with the sweet potato chips on the side.
